projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction Model
projects.description: Built a machine learning model to predict customer churn with 89% accuracy using ensemble methods. Reduced customer attrition by 15% and saved $2M annually.
projects.longDescription: Developed an end-to-end machine learning pipeline to predict customer churn for a telecom company. Analyzed 100K+ customer records, performed feature engineering on 50+ variables, and implemented XGBoost classifier. Created interactive dashboard for business stakeholders to identify at-risk customers.
highlights: Deployed model to production using Docker

projects.title: Sales Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive Tableau dashboard providing real-time insights into sales performance across 500+ retail locations. Improved decision-making speed by 40%.
projects.longDescription: Designed and built a comprehensive sales analytics dashboard using Tableau, connecting to multiple data sources including Salesforce, SQL databases, and Excel sheets. Implemented automated data refresh pipelines and created 20+ interactive visualizations for executive team.
highlights: Reduced reporting time from 2 days to 2 hours
Automated ETL pipeline processing 1M+ records daily

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis Pipeline
projects.description: NLP pipeline for analyzing customer reviews and social media sentiment in real-time. Processes 10K+ reviews daily with 92% accuracy.
projects.longDescription: Built a scalable sentiment analysis system using Python and NLTK to analyze customer feedback from multiple channels. Implemented real-time processing with Apache Kafka, created custom BERT-based model, and deployed to AWS Lambda for serverless execution.

projects.title: Supply Chain Optimization
projects.description: Data-driven supply chain optimization reducing inventory costs by 22% while maintaining 98% service levels across 200+ SKUs.
projects.longDescription: Developed predictive models for demand forecasting and inventory optimization. Created Monte Carlo simulations to optimize safety stock levels, implemented ABC analysis for inventory classification, and built automated reordering system.
